definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: Fabrics with a close weave are ideal for painting.
sentences.chinese: 編織緊密的布最適合作畫。

sentences.english: She loves to draw on the chalkboard paint wall (Hudson Paint).
sentences.chinese: 她喜歡在黑板牆上作畫。

sentences.english: He resumed painting secretly, and went sketching in Zhongshan Park, painting flower-and-bird volumes.
sentences.chinese: 開始悄悄作畫，去中山公園寫生，作花鳥冊頁等。

sentences.english: Artists using this method of mixing colours to draw are called " pointillism".
sentences.chinese: 美術家用這個調色法作畫，稱爲“點描派”。

sentences.english: You'll get a real sense of the physical acts of painting when you look at this picture.
sentences.chinese: 我們在看畫時能真切感受到熬作畫時的張力。

sentences.english: The artist painted in water colors.
For years, he prone paint and his hands full of callosity.
sentences.chinese: 長年俯地作畫，令他雙手佈滿老繭。

sentences.english: The artist is exploring the probability of "paint" on the canvas with cotton thread.
sentences.chinese: 在油畫布上以刺繡棉線作畫，並把數學曲線作爲形象。

sentences.english: As the most important painting is of pedantic, but the foundation is still the most important thing.
sentences.chinese: 作畫自然是書卷氣爲重，但是根基還是最要緊的。

sentences.english: Thee expression on a doodled face is often a good indication of the mood or character of the person who has drawn it.
sentences.chinese: 塗鴉的面部表情通常透露出了作畫者的性格或心情。

sentences.english: The artist painted in water - colors.
He painted by stilling his mind, in a process both painful and therapeutic.
sentences.chinese: 他靜下心來作畫，這是痛苦和治癒的過程。

sentences.english: You've been fagging away at your painting all morning,it's time you take a rest.
sentences.chinese: 你已經辛苦作畫了一整個上午，該休息一會兒了。

sentences.english: Therefore, during the Year of the Goat, as a painter in the painting are many topics.
sentences.chinese: 故每逢羊年，畫家中以此爲題材作畫者甚多。

sentences.english: He was invited to paint at Diaoyutai State Guesthouse.
sentences.chinese: 應邀去釣魚臺國賓館作畫。

sentences.english: A technique of painting directly on a wet, plaster surface.
sentences.chinese: 在潮溼的石膏表面上直接作畫。

definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to suggest (rather than depict in detail)/freehand style of Chinese painting, characterized by bold strokes rather than accurate details
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
